div.p: Waynoka Public Schools will be offering grab and go lunches to students through May 14. Lunches will be offered Monday through Thursday and will be free of charge to the students. Parents must call in a lunch order between 8:00 am and 10:00 am every day at (580)824-4341 in order for their child to receive a meal. Lunches will be available for pick up at the front door of the school from 11:30 – 12:30.
Waynoka Public School office hours will be from 8:00 am – 2:00 pm begining March 23 and running through the Covid-19 mandated break.

All outside doors will be locked during school hours. To enter, a person must ring the outside buzzer at the WEST DOOR of the main building and be recognized by office personnel who will then electronically unlock the door.
